landing.description: Access practical and academic courses designed to boost your personal and professional growth. From carpentry to programming, connect with instructors who share their expertise freely and directly. Upon completing each course, receive a digital certificate that validates your effort and dedication.
landing.header.title: Educational platform to boost academic and professional learning
landing.features.subtitle: Academic and professional training within everyone's reach
landing.features.description: We believe in the power of education. That’s why we have created a digital platform that breaks down classroom barriers. Whether in the academic field or the professional world, our goal is to provide every person with the necessary tools to grow, learn, and progress at their own pace. We connect passionate instructors and students. Because shaping the future is not just a goal, it’s our mission.
landing.courses.title: Academic and professional education system
landing.courses.description: Enhances the academic and professional development of students by integrating tools for learning, vocational guidance, and preparation for the workforce.
landing.facts.title: Learn from those who have already mastered the path
landing.facts.description: We offer comprehensive training, from academic areas to practical skills that prepare you for the real world.
landing.banner.title: Connecting with knowledge
landing.banner.description: Because everyone deserves to learn without limits, we create an environment where sharing and growing is part of everyday life.
landing.courses.paint: Learn how to paint your house
landing.courses.ml: Machine Learning from the Ground Up: Master the Basics and Get Ahead
teaching.title: Share your knowledge with Teach U
teaching.title.description: Teach what you know, inspire others and generate income by sharing your skills.
teaching.title2: Teaching has never been so easy
teaching.reasons.share.title: Share what you know
teaching.reasons.share.description: Transform your experience into a useful and accessible course for thousands of people who want to learn.
teaching.reasons.inspire.title: Inspire and leave your mark
teaching.reasons.inspire.description: Motivate others to grow personally and professionally. Your knowledge can change lives.
teaching.reasons.teach.title: Teach in your own style
teaching.reasons.teach.description: At TeachU you decide how to teach: from home, at your own pace and with your own approach.
learn.title: How to get started
learn.option1.description: The first step is to decide to share your expertise with the world. With TeachU you can turn your knowledge into a practical and useful course. You decide the subject matter, the format and how to make it unique. Get started today.
learn.option2.title: Record your video
learn.option2.description: You don't need a professional studio, just a desire to teach. Record your lessons with authenticity, share real examples and make your students learn the best way: with you.
learn.option3.title: Publish your course
learn.option3.description: By publishing your course on TeachU, you make it visible to thousands of people ready to learn. Share the link, get ratings and start generating revenue with every enrollment.
learn.section3.title: Become an instructor now
learn.section3.description: Share what you know and make a difference in the lives of others. Join our community of passionate instructors.
footer.title: About
